trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref> cells.
trans-unit.target: Vert for en samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref> celler.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewTextBoxColumn class is a specialized type of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that enable displaying and editing of text strings.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataGridViewTextBoxColumn er en spesiell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>klassen som brukes som vert for logisk celler som aktiverer visning og redigering av tekststrenger.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewTextBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> object in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: En DataGridViewTextBoxColumn har en tilknyttet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>objektet i hver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>som går gjennom det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> becomes activated, it supplies a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> control to handle user input.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>er aktivert, den gir en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl>kontrollen skal håndtere brukerinndata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxEditingControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: The sort mode for this column type defaults to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsmodus for denne kolonnetypen som standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn"> </xref> klassen til standardstatusen.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer kolonnen ved å angi følgende egenskaper.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.SortMode%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Verdien | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| En nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.SortMode%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.SortMode%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to model cell appearance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir malen som brukes til modellen celle utseende.

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>klassen initialiserer denne egenskapen til en nyopprettede <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Endre egenskaper for celle malen umiddelbart påvirker ikke brukergrensesnittet (UI) med kolonnens eksisterende celler.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Endringene er bare synlige når kolonnen genereres (for eksempel ved å sortere kolonnen eller via et kall til den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som alle celler i kolonnen er modellert etter.

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Angi typen er ikke kompatibel med typen <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir maksimum antall tegn som kan angis i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The MaxInputLength property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen MaxInputLength påvirker ikke lengden på teksten angitt programmatisk via celleverdien eller formatering.

trans-unit.source: It affects only what the user can input and edit.
trans-unit.target: Den påvirker bare hva brukeren kan angi og redigere.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir denne egenskapen henter eller angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A>for objektet som returneres av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: Angi denne egenskapen også angir den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A>for hver celle i kolonnen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxCell.MaxInputLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil overstyre den angitte verdien for individuelle celler, kan du angi celleverdiene når du har angitt verdien i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall tegn som kan angis i tekstboksen. Standardverdien er 32767.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the sort mode for the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Sorteringsmodus for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is sorted using a column with a SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, a sorting glyph is automatically displayed in the column header.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>kontrollen er sortert ved hjelp av en kolonne med SortMode egenskapsverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, et sortering tegn vises automatisk i kolonneoverskriften.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: When the control is sorted using a column with a SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen sorteres ved hjelp av en kolonne med SortMode egenskapsverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, må du vise sortering tegnet selv via den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorter standardmodus for en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for other column types is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: Sorter standardmodus for andre kolonnetyper er <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: The SortMode value does not prevent you from sorting a column programmatically, although other restrictions may apply.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for SortMode hindrer deg ikke fra sortering en kolonne programmatisk, selv om kan andre begrensninger gjelder.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: A SortMode property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> will not prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> event from occurring, but it will prevent the header from changing its appearance when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: SortMode egenskapsverdien <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>ikke hindrer den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName>hendelse fra inntreffer, men den vil hindre overskriften endrer utseendet når den klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeaderMouseClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref> that specifies the criteria used to order the rows based on the cell values in a column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref> som angir kriteriene som brukes for å sortere rader basert på celleverdiene i en kolonne.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som beskriver kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som beskriver kolonnen.</xref:System.String>
